ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow); Conditions: flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 24.4 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.9 mg/L, hardness 45.8 mg/L calcium carbonate, alkalinity 36.4 mg/L calcium carbonate, and pH 7.7; Concentration: 7.01 g/L for 96 hr (confidence limit: 6.48-7.58 g/L)

EC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow); Conditions: flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 24.4 °C, dissolved oxygen 6.9 mg/L, hardness 45.8 mg/L calcium carbonate, alkalinity 36.4 mg/L calcium carbonate, and pH 7.7; Concentration: 6.74 g/L for 96 hr (confidence limit: 6.20-7.33 g/L); Effect: loss of equilibrium
